Read the data from the file

```{r}
library(rjson)
cookdata = fromJSON(file = "train.json")
cooktest = fromJSON(file = "test.json")
```
Result Preparation


```{r}
tid = c()
for ( datat in cooktest){
   tid = c(tid,datat$id)
}
resultcook = as.data.frame(tid)
fix(resultcook)
```

Find all the Cusine in the list find the ingredients used in the cusine.
```{r}
cusinel = c()
for ( data1 in cookdata){
    if (data1$cuisine %in% cusinel){
      
    }
    else{
      temp = c(data1$cuisine)
      
      cusinel =c(cusinel,temp)
    }
 
  
}


```
```{r}
n = length(cusinel)
cusinelist = list()
for (i in 1:n){
  cusinelist[[cusinel[i]]]=c(1)
  
  
}
```
```{r}
cusinelist[["indian"]] = c(cusinelist[["indian"]], "new")
cusinelist
```
```{r}
lst = list()
lst$a <- list()
lst$b <- list()
lst$a[["foo"]] <- "hi"
lst$b[["foo"]] <- c("hi", "SO")
lst$b[["foo"]] =  c(lst$b[["foo"]],"new")
lst
```

Now we have the list of cusine, so lets make a list for all cusine with ingredients
```{r}
n = length(cusinel)
for (i in 1:n){
  if (cusinel[i] == "indian"){
    cusinel[i] = c(cusinel[i],"new")
  }
}
cusinel
```
